channel.title: Help
channel.description:
client.java:9637: illegal start of expression public void SkillCape() { ^ client.java:9637: illegal start of expression public void SkillCape() { ^ client.java:9637: ';' expected public void SkillCape() { ^ 3 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . .
i have looked everywere for the fix to this but i cant find it anywere can you help me please

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @frostscapeserver frostscapeserver
item.description:
@frostscapeserver wrote:

Phaze One:

You need to have declared the void SkillCape();

Declare public void SkillCape(); somewhere in your client.java near the other voids. Make sure you add your brackets

Read full topic
